name: Heroku Bitcoin Twitter bot
description: Bot that tweets the price of 1 bitcoin every now and then

MY_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY.description: Your user Access Token Key to Twitter for this app

MY_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Your user Access Token Secret to Twitter for this app

TWEET_ACCOUNT.description: Name of the Twitter account (no @) to post to

ODDS.description: How often (in hours) to tweet, in average. 0=always

DEBUG.description: If True, won't tweet. Set to False for normal use
